Lee's_Summit.Summit Woods Crossing:
Summit Woods Crossing is an open air shopping center in Lee's Summit, Missouri which is located on US Hwy 50 at I-470. Summit Woods Crossing is across US 50 from Summit Fair.


== Anchors ==
Super Target
Petco
Lowe's
T.J. Maxx
Dick's Sporting Goods
Michaels
Best Buy
Kohl's
Bed Bath & Beyond
Pier 1 Imports
Office Max
Old Navy


== Summit Fair ==
Summit Fair is an open air shopping center that opened in 2009.
